column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Rosfrith Murray]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Subject:''' Christmas greetings. Tolkien encloses a signed copy of ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]''

column3: signed.<ref name=TL>{{webcite|author=[[Pieter Collier]]|articleurl=http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/pcollier/DSC00003.htm|articlename=#DSC003 - Smith of Wooton Major - Signed by J.R.R. Tolkien on half title page - with author letter from J.R.R. Tolkien to Rosfrith Murray|dated=|website=TL|accessed=21 May 2012}}</ref>

column1: ''This is the American edition (better than ours, though I do not think much of the photograph[)]''. Before signing himself "''Yrs. affectionately Ronald''"
column2: the author states "''...I remember you ... in prayers.''"<ref name=TL/>
